name: unwholesomely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not good for you, and is likely to have a bad effect on your life either physically, morally, or emotionally : She seems to have had an unwholesomely obsessive relationship with her child. As an organization, it has become unwholesomely bureaucratic.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was so unwholesomely bloated that he looked like a man who had been drowned and filled with water.The whole business seemed to me to be unwholesomely secretive.
